column3: You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out.
That money talks, I'll not deny, I heard it once: It said, 'Goodbye'.
Those who are of the opinion that money will do everything may reasonably be expected to do everything for money.
You want 21 percent risk free? Pay off your credit cards.
If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent, those funds are well spent.
Money does not make you happy but it quiets the nerves.
Art for art's sake, money for God's sake.
A fool and his money get a lot of publicity.
Thirteen thousand dollars a year is not enough to raise a family. That's not enough to pay your bills and save for their future. That's barely enough to provide for even the most basic needs.
Money is just a way of keeping score.
It's a terribly hard job to spend a billion dollars and get your money's worth.
